ygData.subject: Ashenwood Spear Owner's manual???
ygData.msgSnippet: A kind fiend has loaned me the use of her Ashenwood Spear.  Unfortunatey, the owner s manual has been mislaid.  It has 10 charges of the Haste Effect. My
ygData.messageBody:
A kind fiend has loaned me the use of her Ashenwood Spear. Unfortunatey,
the owner's manual has been mislaid. It has 10 charges of the Haste Effect.
My question is... are those 10 all it ever has? Or are you able to get it
re-charged? And if so, how does it get re-charged?

TIA,

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 20th level
a.k.a. Robo-Bard
laying in the depths of the Runnyeye Citadel (hoping that Borxx cant see
invis)
somewhere on Innoruuk
